Hello,

I've attempted running Heritrix 3.1.1 multiple times now and have f=
ound that at irregular intervals, the crawler engine goes into the 'pausing=
' state and then just sits there. I don't know why, I cannot predict when, =
and I don't know how. My logs at the time show a fair amount of issues with=
 the MirrorWritterProcessor, but all of the errors are caught and there is =
no indication that the server is going to be kicked into the paused state. =
Is there some sort of feature that causes this that is documented anywhere?=
 I don't see any within my config file.

Niels
